name: Partnership Proposal
template_text:
Subject: Partnership Proposal - [YourCompany] x [TheirCompany]

Dear [FirstName] [LastName],

I hope this email finds you thriving. I am [SenderName], [SenderTitle] at [YourCompany], and I am excited to propose a strategic partnership between our organizations.

**About [YourCompany]:**
[CompanyDescription]

**Why We Chose [TheirCompany]:**
We have been following [TheirCompany]'s impressive work in [TheirIndustry], particularly your [TheirAchievement]. We believe our strengths complement each other perfectly.

**Partnership Proposal:**

*Collaboration Areas:*
• [CollaborationArea1]
• [CollaborationArea2]
• [CollaborationArea3]

*Mutual Benefits:*
__For [TheirCompany]:__
- [Benefit1]
- [Benefit2]

__For [YourCompany]:__
- [Benefit3]
- [Benefit4]

[Conditional:RevenueSharing]

**Next Steps:**
1. Initial discussion call - [ProposedDate]
2. Exchange NDAs if needed
3. Detailed proposal presentation
4. Pilot project: [PilotProject]

I am confident this partnership will create significant value for both our organizations. Would you be available for a 30-minute call next week to explore this opportunity?

[Conditional:AttachedProposal]

Looking forward to your thoughts.

Warm regards,
[SenderName]
[SenderTitle]
[YourCompany]
[Email] | [Phone]
[LinkedIn]
